abstract: Readers are invited to send in questions to Melinda Gates (and to me) about maternal and child health, and women's empowerment, while she's on a trip to Bangladesh.
lead_paragraph: Melinda Gates will be traveling shortly to Bangladesh to look at maternal health, child health and women's issues (including family planning and reproductive health) -- and she has agreed to answer your questions about these topics while she's there. So please post your questions for Melinda and me about these issues in the comments below, and we'll choose some and give you our best answers.

headline.main: Send in Questions for Melinda Gates
